parameters.jsonBody:
={
  "ruleId": "metrics_aggregation_failure",
  "severity": "warning",
  "title": "Metrics Aggregation Failed",
  "message": "Hourly aggregation failed: {{ $json.message || 'Unknown error' }}",
  "component": "metricsCollector",
  "channels": ["slack"],
  "metadata": {
    "errorDetails": "{{ $json.error || $json.message || 'No error details available' }}",
    "timestamp": "{{ $now }}",
    "requestedGranularity": "hourly",
    "requestedComponents": ["agentx", "dataapi", "ollama-main", "ollama-secondary"]
  }
}
